topic.title: Edu Footnotes

fn.p: [The term ‘faithful representation’, which was used in the Conceptual Framework issued in 2018, encompasses the main characteristics that the Framework called ‘reliability’ (refer Conceptual Framework paragraphs 2.12–2.19 and Basis for Conclusions paragraphs BC2.21–BC2.31).]
